name: Ihor Rudenko
description: International speaker within Aesthetic and Dermatology fields. Co-founder and owner of Aesthetic Consilium Groups. Board Member of IMCAS Worldwide. He is an active member of aesthetic dermatological professional community through memberships and leadership roles.

name: Sergiy Prokudin
description: A chief specialist plastic surgeon in the Southern Federal District, scientific director of the European Academy of Anatomy. Honorary SIDE, ASSECE, BAAPS, EAFPS member. Member of the AESTHETIC MEDICINE journal editorial board.

name: Maryna Anfylova
description: Candidate of Medical Sciences, Associate Professor of the Department of Skin and Venereal Diseases at the Vinnytsia National Medical University named after M.I. Pirohov.

name: Inha Voloshyna-Andrashko
description: Director of Asclepius and Estimate clinics in Uzhhorod, Ukraine. Co-owner of Dermarevolta clinic in Bratislava, Slovakia.

name: Olha Chalenko
description: A dermatologist of the highest category, cosmetologist, international trainer, speaker of international congresses.

name: Anna Funykova
description: Member of the Ukrainian Association of Doctors Dermatology and Cosmetology and EADV, founder and leading specialist at Academy of Health Training and Specialists of the Health and Beauty Academy Training Center.

name: Oksana Karapetian
description: Member of the International Association of Aesthetic Cosmetology and Medicine.

name: Yana Vinnychuk
description: Aesthetic medicine physician specializes in injection, hardware procedures, classical cosmetic cosmetology, surgical procedures, thread techniques, non-surgical rhinoplasty.

name: Kuzma Hobzey
description: Trichologist at the multi-purpose Euroderm Dermatological Clinic (clinical base of the Institute of Psoriasis and Chronic Dermatosis).

name: Valeriia Rabizo
description: a doctor gynecologist, dermatologist, cosmetologist, EADV member. 10 years of experience in gynecology and 16 years of experience as a cosmetologist.

name: Elvira Chovhan
description: Specialist in injection and classical cosmetology, leading specialist at Lady Elegance, Vinnytsia Office of Laser, Instrumental and Manual Cosmetology.

name: Serhiy Derbak
description: Member of the All-Ukrainian Association of Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgeons, the Ukrainian Society of Aesthetic Medicine, the Club of Plastic Surgeons of Ukraine.

name: Tatiana Shevchuk
description: Head of GRACE COSMOGYN Clinic, Ph.D., top-level doctor, member of the European Society of Aesthetic Gynecology, member of the Association of Laser Medicine and Cosmetology of Ukraine.

name: Anton Leonov
description: A cosmetologist. Allergan, an expert international company, Ukrainian aesthetic speaker, head physician at Clinic Profi+.
